remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类承载 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的 Direct3D 内容。Use the class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 调用方法来更改显示的 Direct3D 内容。Call the method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the . 调用用于将分配到的 Direct3D 面方法。Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to a . 调用方法，以跟踪更新到 Direct3D 图面。Call the method to track updates to the Direct3D surface. 调用方法以显示更改的区域。Call the method to display the changed areas. 类管理两个显示缓冲区，称为*后台缓冲区*和*前台缓冲区*。The class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*. 后台缓冲区是你的 Direct3D 面。The back buffer is your Direct3D surface. 更改对后台缓冲区复制转发到前台缓冲区在调用时方法，其中显示在硬件。Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the method, where it is displayed on the hardware. 有时，前台缓冲区变得不可用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 此缺乏可用性可能引起屏幕锁定、 全屏幕独占 Direct3D 应用程序、 用户切换或其他系统活动。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 当发生这种情况时，通知 WPF 应用程序通过处理事件。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 你的应用程序响应前台缓冲区变得不可用的方式取决于是否启用 WPF 为回退到软件呈现。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法具有一个重载采用一个参数，指定是否 WPF 回退到软件呈现。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. ## 在 WPF 不会回退到软件呈现时进行响应到不可用前缓冲区Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering 当调用重载或调用重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`false`，当前台缓冲区变得不可用，并且执行任何操作时，呈现系统释放其对后台缓冲区的引用显示。When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 呈现系统前台缓冲区再次可用时，将引发事件以通知你的 WPF 应用程序。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件重新启动再次与有效的 Direct3D 面呈现。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新启动呈现，必须调用。To restart rendering, you must call . ## 在 WPF 回退回软件呈现时进行响应到不可用前缓冲区Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering 当调用重载`enableSoftwareFallback`参数设置为`true`，呈现系统保留它对后台缓冲区的引用时前台缓冲区变得不可用，因此无需调用时前面缓冲区重新变为可用。When you call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能有用户的设备变得不可用的情况。There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable. 当发生这种情况时，调用来释放对后台缓冲区的 WPF 的引用。When that occurs, call to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer. 如果你需要重置你的设备，调用与`backBuffer`参数设置为`null`，然后调用试`backBuffer`设置为有效的 Direct3D 图面。If you need to reset your device, call with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. > [!NOTE] > 性能极大地取决于 Direct3D 面的设置。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Direct3D9 和 WPF 互操作性的性能注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). > [!NOTE] > 类时不显示 Direct3D 内容 WPF 呈现在软件中，例如通过远程桌面连接，除非调用并指定`true`为`enableSoftwareFallback`参数。The class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter. ## `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 上允许多级采样`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`仅呈现。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用用于将分配 Direct3D 面方法。The following code example shows how to call the method to assign a Direct3D surface. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的锁计数达到零时，将完全取消锁定。When the lock count for the reaches zero, the is fully unlocked. 标记用于呈现如果映像已更改为以前的调用由指定的区域方法。The is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the method. 当在提交更改并进行呈现后，其他调用方法阻止，直到呈现线程具有后台缓冲区的内容复制到前台缓冲区。When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer. 此同步可避免显示项目，比如撕裂。This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing. > [!NOTE] > 未更新时的 Direct3D 面处于解除锁定状态。Do not update the Direct3D surface while the is unlocked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法将更新的后台缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。The following code example shows how to call the method to copy the updated back buffer to the front buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载内容在 WPF 中的 Direct3D9](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
